abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web looking for the most interesting, insightful and just plain odd news that might otherwise go unnoticed and unremarked. Today brings Roger McNamee on saving the Internet, freezing Amazon warehouse workers and Angry Birds in space. The complete Scuttlebot feed is in the right-hand column.

lead_paragraph: Here’s what the reporters and editors of The New York Times tech staff found on the Web. The full Scuttlebot feed is on this page in the right-hand column.
